extends java.lang.Object

Connects calibration grid squares together.

Method Detail

pruneSmallIslands

public static java.util.List<QuadBlob> pruneSmallIslands(java.util.List<QuadBlob> blobs)
Finds the largest island in the graph and returns that

findIsland

public static java.util.List<QuadBlob> findIsland(QuadBlob seed,
                                                  java.util.List<QuadBlob> all)
Given an initial node, it searches for every node which is connect to it. Seed is assumed to have already been removed from 'all'

connect

public static void connect(java.util.List<QuadBlob> blobs)
For each blob it finds the blobs which are directly next to it. Up to 4 blobs can be next to any blob and two connected blobs should have the closes side approximately parallel.

copy

public static java.util.List<QuadBlob> copy(java.util.List<QuadBlob> input)
Creates a proper copy of the sub-graph removing any references to nodes not in this sub-graph.
